text: Wendlingen is a town in Esslingen in Baden-Württemberg in southern Germany. It is at the confluence of the Neckar and Lauter rivers. It is 27 km southeast of Stuttgart. The town has three districts: Wendlingen, Unterboihingen and Bodelshofen. == Twin towns == Wendlingen is twinned with: * Dorog, Hungary * Millstatt, Austria * Saint-Leu-la-Forêt, France == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Esslingen (district)
title: Wendlingen
